name: Rayman Garden
storyline: "Find the magic Lums hidden in the Rayman garden as quickly as possible, advance using the circular button, use your swords to fight the enemies, press on 4 to attack with your sword and 7 to carry out a super attack with your fire sword, you can advance using the circular button, each fight or obstacle will cost you a sword be aware as they are quickly used up, to save your swords return to walk mode by pressing on 1, again beware if you come across an enemy without a sword, you will lose 2 lives from a red monster, 1 life from a normal enemy, it is therefore up to you to manage your swords and avoid the enemies, 1 Lum will win you 1 life up to a limit of 10 lives, watch out for the black hole that warrants a return penalty, but above all else you are being chased by your mortal enemy dark rayman, do not let your self be caught or you'll be dead, your score depends on how quickly you find the four Lums and on the level of difficulty, which will change the number of obstacles and position of the Lums" - The game's actual description
